name: IED
description:
IED is a minimalist commentary on the dangers of overseas deployment. It's designed as an approachable game to raise awareness of the unpredictable tragedies that IEDs (Improvised Explosive Device) can deliver.

The game puts you in the boots of a soldier stationed overseas. Follow your compass through a randomly generated minefield of IEDs to return to camp.

WASD/Arrow keys to move

F toggles fullscreen

ESC exits game

www.jmakegames.com
